thread.section_title: Fast Cover Travel Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fast Cover Travel Insurance | fastcover.com.au
thread.title: Graham
thread.title_full: Fast Cover Travel Insurance reviewed by Graham

author: Graham
title: Graham
text: I was diagnosed with a heart condition just days before we were due to fly out to Vietnam. After providing all the relevant information, Fast Travel fully refunded our expenditure for the trip. This was a great relief and induced very positive feelings towards Fast Travel.
